title: Integrative Medicine Clinic
description: The official website for Mike O'Callaghan Military Medical Center at Nellis Air Force Base
sitename: Mike O'Callaghan Military Medical Center - Nellis Air Force Base
cleaned_text: use Integrative Medicine techniques and technologies to work to restore whole health in patients. We also assist with development, acquisition and transition of these techniques and technologies to military medical practice through clinical and implementation trials and education of medical personnel. If you are interested in our clinic, please talk to your Primary Care Manager to see if you are a good candidate and get a referral to our clinic.
